page.title: 08A DAY AT BODIAM C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: I am 10 years old and I go to the local primary school in Bodiam. It is a small village school with two classes - infants and juniors. I walk to school and go into class. The spellings are on the blackboard and I write them down in my book. Then I do Maths until playtime at 10.45am. I come in at 11.00 and I do English. After this it is dinner time and then we go out to play. At the beginning of the afternoon we read for a while and then I do some more work until it is time to go home at 3.30pm.
